ai-thig13.1:1.1_0: My hair was as black as bees,
ai-thig13.1:1.3_0: now old, it has become like hemp bark—
ai-thig13.1:1.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:2.2_0: my head was as fragrant as a perfume box;
ai-thig13.1:2.3_0: now old, it smells like dog fur—
ai-thig13.1:2.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:3.1_0: My hair was as thick as a well-planted forest,
ai-thig13.1:3.2_0: it shone, parted with brush and pins;
ai-thig13.1:3.3_0: now old, it’s patchy and sparse—
ai-thig13.1:3.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:4.1_0: With plaits of black and ribbons of gold,
ai-thig13.1:4.2_0: it was so pretty, adorned with braids;
ai-thig13.1:4.3_0: now old, it’s patchy and sparse—
ai-thig13.1:4.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:5.1_0: My eyebrows used to look so nice,
ai-thig13.1:5.2_0: like crescents painted by an artist;
ai-thig13.1:5.3_0: now old, they’re cracked and wrinkly—
ai-thig13.1:5.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:6.1_0: My eyes shone brilliant as gems,
ai-thig13.1:6.3_0: ruined by age, they shine no more—
ai-thig13.1:6.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:7.1_0: My nose was like a perfect peak,
ai-thig13.1:7.2_0: lovely in my bloom of youth;
ai-thig13.1:7.3_0: now old, it’s shriveled like a pepper;
ai-thig13.1:7.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:8.3_0: now old, they’re cracked and wrinkly—
ai-thig13.1:8.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:9.1_0: My teeth used to be so pretty,
ai-thig13.1:9.3_0: now old, they’re broken and yellow—
ai-thig13.1:9.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:10.1_0: My singing was sweet as a cuckoo
ai-thig13.1:10.3_0: now old, it’s patchy and sparse—
ai-thig13.1:10.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:11.1_0: My neck used to be so pretty,
ai-thig13.1:11.2_0: like a polished shell of conch;
ai-thig13.1:11.3_0: now old, it’s bowed and bent—
ai-thig13.1:11.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:12.1_0: My arms used to be so pretty,
ai-thig13.1:12.3_0: now old, they droop like a trumpet-flower tree—
ai-thig13.1:12.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:13.1_0: My hands used to be so pretty,
ai-thig13.1:13.3_0: now old, they’re like red radishes—
ai-thig13.1:13.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:14.1_0: My breasts used to be so pretty,
ai-thig13.1:14.3_0: now they droop like water bags—
ai-thig13.1:14.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:15.1_0: My body used to be so pretty,
ai-thig13.1:15.2_0: like a polished slab of gold;
ai-thig13.1:15.3_0: now it’s covered with fine wrinkles—
ai-thig13.1:15.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:16.1_0: Both my thighs used to be so pretty,
ai-thig13.1:16.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:17.1_0: My calves used to be so pretty,
ai-thig13.1:17.3_0: now old, they’re like sesame sticks—
ai-thig13.1:17.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:18.1_0: Both my feet used to be so pretty,
ai-thig13.1:18.3_0: now old, they’re cracked and wrinkly—
ai-thig13.1:18.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
ai-thig13.1:19.1_0: This bag of bones once was such,
ai-thig13.1:19.2_0: but now it’s withered, home to so much pain;
ai-thig13.1:19.3_0: like a house in decay with plaster crumbling—
ai-thig13.1:19.4_0: the word of the truthful one is confirmed.
